item.title: Aloha!
item.description: Welcome! Hi, my name is Paulo. This is my personal website, and I post about things that interest me. You can find me on Twitter @paregis.
item.content:
Welcome!

Hi, my name is Paulo.

This is my personal website, and I post about things that interest me.

You can find me on Twitter @paregis.
